mention.text: Thursday `` Today , March 16 , 1989 , the American journalist Terry Anderson , 41 , chief Middle East correspondent for The Associated Press in Beirut , entered the American journalist Terry Anderson fifth year of captivity as a hostage in Lebanon
the National Press Club in Washington
Vice President Dan Quayle on freedom of the press
